name: Pocket Dig
description:
Hello! 

This is my first ever mobile game that I published. It took a lot longer than I care to admit and it isn't perfect, but I am proud of it! I used to love Motherload when I was growing up and It is 100% the inspiration for this game. It is certainly more cut down, and the graphics need improved as well as maybe new features added, but I wanted to get it out there and see what people had to say!
